short_summary: Supply and Installation of Boilers at Canadian Embassy in Washington, D.C.
description: The purpose of this RFQ is to select a supplier to enter into a contract with the Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) for the supply and installation of boilers at the Canadian Embassy in Washington D.C., as described in the Statement of Work (Annex A).
full_summary:
==============================================================



### Supply and Installation of Boilers at Canadian Embassy in Washington, D.C.

**Notice Information**
---------------------

*   **Tender Reference Number**: cb-9320-79851133
*   **Public Closing Date and Time**: October 12, 2023, 2:00 PM ET
*   **Amendment Number**: 5
*   **Solicitation Number**: 24-242784
*   **Publication Date**: September 21, 2023

**Tender Description**
---------------------

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) invites bidders to submit a request for proposal to supply and install new boilers at the Canadian Embassy in Washington D.C.

The successful bidder will be responsible for delivering and installing two high-efficiency boilers and associated equipment at the embassy, according to the specifications outlined in Annex A of the tender document.

**Trade Agreements**
------------------

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For any queries related to this tender, kindly reach out to:

Michael Spencer
michael.spencer@international.gc.ca
Phone: (613) 296-0912
